title: why do people say im so salty
body: why do people say im so salty when they haven't tasted me?? i even licked myself but i don't think i was even that salty, maybe a little but how would they even know?

replies.body: No, you are just so salty you are so used to the taste of salt that you no longer notice it! lel

That's because your taste is more pronounced if you lick further down to .....

ahem, you get the idea. The real salty.

> That's because your taste is more pronounced if you lick further down to .....
> 
> ahem, you get the idea.

but they dont know if im really even salty. im so confused
